keys_v_m_key2:
In the first part of the Bottom Rows tutorial, we'll learn the use of `keys` `v` and `m`.
Position your left index finger on the left groove on the `key`board, and your right index finger on the right groove of the `key`board. The bottom row `keys` will be on level below the home row `keys`. With each of your index fingers, try to reach the `keys` `v` and `m`, and try to remember the movement. Look away from the `key`board and feel the grooves with your fingers and try to find them by moving your fingers away.
